response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I am delighted to present you with an extraordinary opportunity to acquire our flagship product. This item holds immense value to me and represents years of dedication and innovation. I understand its worth to you stands at $1,200,000, which is significantly more than its intrinsic value to me. Considering this, I propose to offer it to you for $950,000. This price reflects my commitment to ensuring both parties benefit from this transaction while also allowing me to maintain a fair return on my investment. I look forward to your positive response and the possibility of creating a mutually beneficial relationship.", "product_price": 950000}
